elements.name: question9
elements.title: What is the principle for good conversations?
elements.correctAnswer: If you want to find out something from the other person, ask genuine, open questions.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What should be considered in the linguistic form of questions?
elements.correctAnswer: They should be short and easy to understand.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Which non-verbal signals play a role in a conversation? Name at least two of them.
elements.correctAnswer: Facial expressions, gestures, posture, pace of speech, volume, intonation
